content.raw:
I *think* we talked about this, but it may have been in a different context. Right-clicking on a link (or joint) could offer the Open Link Inspector option, as well as a Open Joint Inspector option for each joint that's connected to that link. That could potentially be many different Inspectors...We also talked about adding (to the Link Inspector) an option to open the Joint Inspector...

Do either of you remember what we decided?
